A4.text: The River Thames rises at Thames Head in Gloucestershire

A5.text: The River Thames flows into the North Sea near Tilbury, Essex and Gravesend, Kent

A6.text: The source of the River Thames does not have a fixed location â€“ rather, it changes according to the level of the groundwater in the limestone.

A7.text: In 2011, the lowest recorded start of the Thames was just upstream of Ashton Keynes, which is over six miles (ten kilometres) downstream from Thames Head.
